```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(treemap)
library(janitor)
```


## INTERNAL SERVICE FUND
#Import data by reading each excel page as a csv and saving it to a dataframe
```{r}
df_01_sinking_fund_gen_op = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/01_SinkingFundGenOp_pg465.csv')
df_02_telephone_exc = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/02_TelephoneExchange_pg467-68.csv')
df_03_radio_comm = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/03_OfficeofRadioComm_pg472-73.csv')
df_04_motor_vehicle_mtn = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/04_MotorVehicleMtn_pg477-79.csv')
df_05_printing_reprod = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/05_Printing&Reproduc_pg482-83.csv')
df_06_health_insurance_fund = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/06_HealthSelfInsuranceFund_pg488.csv')
df_07_prescription_self_insurance_fund = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/07_PrscptnSelfInsrncFund_pg489.csv')
df_08_CCA_income_tax = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/08_CCAIncomeTaxAdmin_pg493-95.csv')
```


#Get the 2017 Values for the Claims Refunds Maintenance section
```{r}
ISF_health_insurance_fund_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017 <- df_06_health_insurance_fund[13:16, 1:2]
ISF_prescription_self_insurance_fund_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017 <- df_07_prescription_self_insurance_fund[2:3, 1:2]
ISF_CCA_income_tax_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017 <- df_08_CCA_income_tax[62:64, 1:2]
```

#Merge all the offices into one dataframe

```{r}
all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017 <- Reduce(function(r_x,r_y) merge(x=r_x, y=r_y, by=1, all=TRUE),  
  list(ISF_health_insurance_fund_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017,ISF_prescription_self_insurance_fund_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017, ISF_CCA_income_tax_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017))
```

#Rename first column
```{r}
names(all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017)[1] <- 'claims_refunds_maintenance_2017'
names(all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017)[2] <- 'Health Insurance Fund'
names(all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017)[3] <- 'Prescription Self Insurance Fund'
names(all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017)[4] <- 'CCA Income Tax Administration'
all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017[7,1] <- "Total" #renaming row to "total"

all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017 <- clean_names(all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017) #cleans the column names

```

#Create file
```{r}
write.csv(all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017,"all_claims_refunds_maintenance_2017.csv")
```
